EPH 1.15 duþþe jah ik, gahausjands izwara galaubein in fraujin Iesu Xristau jah frijaþwa in allans þans weihans, EPH 1.16 unsweibands awiliudo in izwara, gamund waurkjands in bidom meinaim, EPH 1.17 ei guþ fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus, atta wulþaus, gibai izwis ahman handugeins jah andhuleinais in ufkunþja seinamma, EPH 1.18 inliuhtida augona hairtins izwaris, ei witeiþ jus ƕa ist wens laþonais is, ƕileikuh gabei wulþaus arbjis is in weihaim, EPH 1.19 jah ƕa ufarassus mikileins mahtais is in uns þaim galaubjandam bi waurstwa mahtais swinþeins is, EPH 1.20 þatei gawaurhta in Xristau, urraisjands ina us dauþaim jah gasatida in taihswon seinai in himinam EPH 1.21 ufaro allaize reikje jah waldufnje jah mahte jah fraujinassiwe jah allaize namne namnidaize ni þatainei in þamma aiwa, ak jah in þamma anawairþin.
EPH 1.22 jah alla ufhnaiwida uf fotuns imma jah ina atgaf haubiþ ufar alla aikklesjon, EPH 1.23 sei ist leik is, fullo þis alla in allaim usfulljandins.

EPH 2.1 Jah izwis wisandans dauþans missadedim jah frawaurhtim izwaraim, EPH 2.2 in þaimei simle iddjeduþ bi þizai aldai þis fairƕaus, bi reik waldufnjis luftaus, ahmins þis nu waurkjandins in sunum ungalaubeinais, EPH 2.3 in þaimei jah weis allai usmetum suman in lustum leikis unsaris, taujandans wiljans leikis jah gamitone, jah wesum wistai barna hatize, swaswe jah þai anþarai.

EPH 2.4 iþ guþ, gabigs wisands in armahairtein, in þizos managons frijaþwos þizaiei frijoda uns, EPH 2.5 jah wisandans uns dauþans frawaurhtim miþgaqiwida uns Xristau— anstai sijuþ ganasidai— EPH 2.6 jah miþurraisida jah miþgasatida in himinakundaim in Xristau Iesu, EPH 2.7 ei ataugjai in aldim þaim anagaggandeim ufarassu gabeins anstais seinaizos in selein bi uns in Xristau Iesu.
EPH 2.8 unte anstai siuþ ganasidai þairh galaubein, jah þata ni us izwis, ak gudis giba ist;
EPH 2.9 ni us waurstwam, ei ƕas ni ƕopai, EPH 2.10 ak is sium taui, gaskapanai in Xristau Iesu du waurstwam godaim, þoei fauragamanwida guþ, ei in þaim gaggaima.
EPH 2.11 duþþe gamuneiþ þatei jus þiudos simle wesuþ in leika, þai namnidans unbimaitanai fram þizai namnidon bimait in leika handuwaurht.
EPH 2.12 unte wesuþ þan in jainamma mela inu Xristu, framaþjai usmetis Israelis jah gasteis gahaite trausteis, wen ni habandans jah gudalausai in manasedai.
EPH 2.13 iþ nu sai, in Xristau Iesu jus juzei simle wesuþ fairra, waurþuþ neƕa in bloþa Xristaus.

EPH 2.14 sa auk ist gawairþi unsar, saei gatawida þo ba du samin jah midgardiwaddju faþos gatairands, EPH 2.15 fijaþwa, ana leika seinamma witoþ anabusne garaideinim gatairands, ei þans twans gaskopi in sis silbin du ainamma niujamma mann, waurkjands gawairþi, EPH 2.16 jah gafriþodedi þans bans in ainamma leika guda þairh galgan, afslahands fijaþwa in sis silbin.
EPH 2.17 jah qimands wailamerida gawairþi izwis juzei fairra jah gawairþi þaim ize neƕa;
EPH 2.18 unte þairh ina habam atgagg bajoþs in ainamma ahmin du attin.
EPH 2.19 sai nu ni sijuþ gasteis jah aljakonjai, ak sijuþ gabaurgjans þaim weiham jah ingardjans gudis, EPH 2.20 anatimridai...
EPH 2.21 in þammei alla gatimrjo gagatiloda wahseiþ du alh weihai in fraujin,
EPH 2.22 in þammei jah jus miþgatimridai sijuþ du bauainai gudis in ahmin.
EPH 3.1 In þizozei waihtais ik Pawlus bandja Xristaus Iesuis in izwara þiudo, EPH 3.2 jabai sweþauh hausideduþ fauragaggi gudis anstais, sei gibana ist mis in izwis;

EPH 3.3 unte bi andhuleinai gakannida was mis so runa, swe fauragamelida in leitilamma, EPH 3.4 duþþe ei siggwandans mageiþ fraþjan frodein meinai in runai Xristaus, EPH 3.5 þatei anþaraim aldim ni kunþ was sunum manne, swaswe nu andhuliþ ist þaim weiham is apaustaulum jah praufetum in ahmin, EPH 3.6 wisan þiudos gaarbjans jah galeikans jah gadailans gahaitis is in Xristau Iesu þairh aiwaggeljon, EPH 3.7 þizozei warþ andbahts ik bi gibai anstais gudis þizai gibanon mis bi toja mahtais is.
